summary: This is a 2021 email chain between FBI personnel discussing a request for travel records for Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein, beginning in 1994. It lists known passport and travel document identifiers for both individuals.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The email contains a detailed list of her known passports and travel documents (US, UK, France) from 1994 onward, requested by the FBI.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email contains a request for his travel records and lists his known US passports, with one expiration date noted as 3/3/2005.

connections.description: Both are subjects of the same FBI travel records request, indicating their linked investigation.

events.title: FBI Request for Travel Records
events.description: An FBI agent sends a request to check travel records for Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein beginning in 1994.

keyFacts: The FBI was actively seeking travel records for Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein as of March 2021.
Ghislaine Maxwell was documented to have held multiple passports from the US, UK, and France between 1994 and 2001.
Jeffrey Epstein's US passport had an expiration date of March 3, 2005, as noted in the request.
The request originates from the FBI New York Field Office's Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking unit.
The email shows internal FBI coordination, with an agent's partner being cc'd on the request.
